body:
Hey there!


Since the official Avicus discord is closing, we have decided to create another one to stay in touch with people, We hope to carry on the great community Avicus had and not lose touch with the friends we made! Feel free to spread the link around to everyone before the server and forums shutdown so we have a place to chat! We are excited to bring you a new discord that won't be shutting down :)!


Link: https://discord.gg/RZbczjY

title: The Unofficial Avicus Discord!

replies.body: This Avicus Discord won’t shut down for random reasons when the server shuts down!
replies.body_tagged: This Avicus Discord won’t shut down for random reasons when the server shuts down!
